issues.message: Hardcoded API key found in configuration file
issues.recommendation: Use environment variables or secure key management service

issues.message: SQL injection vulnerability in user query
Unbounded memory allocation in data processing

issues.message: Complex function with cyclomatic complexity of 15
Missing JSDoc comments for public API

recommendations.title: Implement Security Headers
recommendations.description: Add security headers like CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options to prevent common attacks
recommendations.impact: Protects against XSS, clickjacking, and other client-side attacks

recommendations.title: Add Rate Limiting
recommendations.description: Implement rate limiting on API endpoints to prevent abuse
recommendations.impact: Prevents API abuse and DoS attacks

recommendations.title: Optimize Database Queries
recommendations.description: Add indexes and optimize slow queries identified in performance analysis
recommendations.impact: Can improve response times by up to 50%
